description:
An enormously wealthy and enigmatic man who returned triumphantly from the depth of space. With Albert`s introduction, he makes his debut in the high society of Paris. With his attractive looks and witty conversation skills, he instantly becomes a favourite within that world.
However, his true identity is that of a cool-headed, vengeful demon, who vows to seek revenge against his former friends who have betrayed him in the past.
name: Monte-Cristo Hakushaku
